cookingTips: Brown sausage thoroughly before adding cream cheese to ensure even heating
Stir constantly when adding cream cheese to prevent lumps
Keep warm in a slow cooker for serving at parties
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This dip combines two sausage textures for flavor depth. How will you prevent the cream cheese from curdling when heated?
